question: Show me all parts which applicable in Engine Fuel Group of velocity
sql_query: SELECT * FROM velocity WHERE aggregate = 'engine, fuel group'

question: Give me the data of pulley which used in ZXI.
sql_query:
select *
from velocity
where
    model ilike '%zxi%'
    and description ilike '%pulley%';

question: Give me all parts of Power Train Chassis Group.
sql_query:
select *
from velocity
where
    aggregate = 'power train, chassis group'

question: Give me all parts of FIG - 22 of VXI.
sql_query:
select *
from velocity
where
    model ilike '%vxi%'
    and groupno = 'fig - 22';

question: May i know all plug parts details of Cylinder Block Group.
sql_query:
select *
from velocity
where
    description = 'plug'
    and assemblyname ilike '%cylinder block group%';

question: Give some parts of BEARING CAP.
sql_query: select * from velocity where description = 'bearing cap';

question: Given me all parts of FIG - 22 EXHAUST SYSTEM.
sql_query:
select *
from velocity
where
    groupno = 'fig - 22'
    and assemblyname = 'exhaust system';

question: May I know the all blade Parts of PISTON ASSEMBLY of 1.3 VXI
sql_query:
select *
from velocity
where
    model ilike '%1.3 vxi%'
    and assemblyname ilike '%piston assembly%'
    and description ilike '%blade%';

question: Give me parts information of TEST ASSEMBLY which used under LXI & VXI
sql_query:
select *
from velocity
where (
        model ilike '%lxi%'
        or model ilike '%vxi%'
    )
    and assemblyname = 'test assembly'

question: Show me data of Side Body ASSEMBLY which used under 1.3 LXI & ZXI?
sql_query:
select *
from velocity
where (
        model ilike '%lxi%'
        or model ilike '%zxi%'
    )
    and assemblyname = 'side body'

question: Provide me the all filter parts which is used in side Body.
sql_query:
select *
from velocity
where description ilike '%filters%'
    and assemblyname = 'side body'

question: Provide me the all parts which is used in LXI
sql_query:
select *
from velocity
where model ilike '%lxi%'
